data.text: Inside London’s iconic ‘Walkie-Talkie’ building you can find one of our absolute favourite hidden spots: a sky garden on the top floor, which offers one of the most fantastic views of the city you can get. Ready to check it out? Grab your ticket now! 👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF https://t.co/BxbUncUvJX

data.text:
NEW ROUTES FROM ROME 🇮🇹
The new routes just won't stop coming at WIZZ! Now you can travel directly from Rome to Barcelona, Paris Orly, Porto, Valencia, Seville, Malaga or Gothenburg Landvetter. Book now on https://t.co/AeMNWOKuvd! https://t.co/mabRh9gTGU

urls.title: WIZZ – Dream more. Live more. Be more.
urls.description: Fly with Europe's greenest ultra-low cost airline. Friendly service, low fares and lots of destinations.

data.text:
NEW ROUTES FROM LONDON, TIRANA AND ATHENS 🇬🇧 🇦🇱 🇬🇷
The new routes just keep coming at WIZZ! Now you can travel directly from:
- London to Lodz and Bydgoszcz
- Tirana to Athens
- Athens to Tel Aviv  
Book now on https://t.co/AeMNWOslh5 https://t.co/bt5hKZO1rY

urls.title: WIZZ – Dream more. Live more. Be more.
urls.description: Fly with Europe's greenest ultra-low cost airline. Friendly service, low fares and lots of destinations.

data.text: There's a spot people visiting London tend to miss: Neal’s Yard is like a little fairy-tale land in the heart of a giant city. With colourful houses and cute shops surrounding you, it's like you've stepped into another dimension. Ready to check it out?👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF https://t.co/PkTuX5uwQl

data.text: @kristians83 Hi!  You can find the form here in the complaints section in the second row: https://t.co/th7YMTeRwK

@HorseshitNinja Hi there! A foldable baby stroller or a small foldable cot travel are free of charge (will be loaded in aircraft hold). In order to take car seat on board you have to purchase extra seat.
Have a good day:)
